title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 3, Mistral, Gemma and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama; chat, generate, embed, pull, list, delete models with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node & browsers; same API surface as the Python client.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package to use any Ollama model as an LLM or embeddings provider.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (chat UI, model management, multi-user, RAG, plugins).

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama; fluent builder API, streaming, embeddings, list/pull/delete models.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Community-maintained Ruby gem for chatting and managing Ollama models.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Cross-platform TUI client for Ollama written in Rust; chat, model ops, keyboard-driven.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: Turn any Ollama model into a GitHub Copilot-style code-completion service for VS Code.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration to use Ollama models as generators or chatters in Haystack pipelines.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET SDK for Ollama; strongly-typed, async streaming, dependency-injection friendly.

title: ollama-vscode
summary: VS Code extension that adds Ollama chat & code-generation panels inside the editor.

title: ollama-models
summary: Community-curated collection of Modelfiles for StableLM, CodeLlama, Vicuna, etc.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU autoscaling.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG template using Ollama + Chroma + LangChain to chat with local PDFs.

title: ollama discord bot
summary: Self-hostable Discord bot that brings Ollama models into any server with slash commands.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module that spins up Ollama as a CI service for testing LLM-powered features.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Rust crate providing async/await bindings to the Ollama REST API.

title: ollama-streamlit
summary: Streamlit chat app template that proxies to Ollama with session memory and model picker.

title: ollama-npm
summary: Official npm package for JavaScript/TypeScript developers to integrate Ollama models.
